code: import{configureStore}from'@reduxjs/toolkit';import authenticationReducer from'./Slices/authenticationSlice';import{persistStore,persistReducer,FLUSH,REHYDRATE,PAUSE,PERSIST,PURGE,REGISTER}from'redux-persist';import storage from'redux-persist/lib/storage';var persistConfig={key:'root',version:1,storage:storage,blacklist:['error_message']};var persistedReducer=persistReducer(persistConfig,authenticationReducer);export var store=configureStore({reducer:{authentication:persistedReducer},middleware:function middleware(getDefaultMiddleware){return getDefaultMiddleware({serializableCheck:{ignoredActions:[FLUSH,REHYDRATE,PAUSE,PERSIST,PURGE,REGISTER]}});}});export var persistor=persistStore(store);
